   - The union of all stars of the elements in \( S \) is the union of all sets in \( \mathcal{T}_i \).

4. **Intersecting Families:**

     - \( \mathcal{F} = \{\{a, b\}, \{b, c\}\} \)

   - The union of the stars is \( \{a, b, c, d\} \), which has size 4.
